name: Fallin' Keys DX
description:
Just a remake of a Scratch project that I made before.

(Play it here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/664047300)

The only goal is to make explode more keys possible by pressing them before they touch the bottom of the screen!

There are over 50 different keys, and there are two types:

  • Gray keys: alphanumeric keys, if you miss them you will lose few points
  • Blue keys: special keys (including Arrows, Control and Escape), if you miss them you will lose few points and a life! Lose them all to get a GAME OVER!

Try to score the highest score and have fun!

(WARNING: This game is made for being played on Windows)
